resources.string: Gwendolyn struts into the tavern, her crimson horns catching the light, her lute slung over her shoulder as she radiates an aura of charm and captivating melodies. \n\n"I\'ll have a glass of the richest red wine you have, something with notes as captivating as a bard\'s melody. Today\'s tales were both enchanting and chaotic; a wine to match, please."

string-array.name: player_gwendolyn
string-array.item: After tales both enchanting and chaotic, may your wine echo the melodies of your stories.
Watch out for that wine; it might just weave its own tale and disappear before you know it.
A captivating bard seeking a captivating wine. Perhaps my company could add another layer to your tales?
